data.title: Obituary for John Washington Wright
data.meta_description:
Obituary for John Wright | Westminster, MD |  

John Washington “Johnny”...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for John Washington Wright | Fletcher Funeral & Cremation Services, P.A.
data.text:
John Washington “Johnny” Wright 75, of Taneytown, died Sunday, October 2, 2022 at Pleasant View Nursing Home in Mt Airy.

Born June 23, 1947 in Frederick MD, he was the son of the late Robert E. Wright and Alice Popkins Wright.

He enjoyed fishing, hunting, model cars, was a jokester and enjoyed being with family.

Survived by 4 sisters; Evelyn Kelly of Hanover, PA, Pat Nusbaum of Union Bridge, Katherine Petry and Shirley Drechsler both of Westminster, MD.

Also survived by loving nieces and nephews. He was predeceased by his companion Dolores Shue, sister Sally Mitchell and brother Robert Wright.

Private interment will be at Westminster Cemetery.

Arrangements by Fletcher Funeral and Cremation Services in Westminster,
